title: This isn't the first time its happened.
body:
I've noticed that when my client starts bugging out eg, When queue is accepted and goes into champ select all writing goes out of place, I go to change masterys and it freezes straight up. Usally I wait out 5mins till game is loaded in otherwise if i close leauge it will force me as a dodge and loose LP. Any help appreciated. Pretty sure its when leauge has been opened for awhile and memory starts going above 200,000k in task manager. Wonder if there is a way to keep the memory down. Thanks
[IMG}https://s3.postimg.org/rkjsh5p9f/srsly.png[/IMG]

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, perhaps try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) to see if that helps.


>Wonder if there is a way to keep the memory down.

Restart the client every now and then, wait for LCU :)
